reviewText: I got this for my wife, a beginner. I hadn't heard of most of the golfers except for Peggy Kirk Bell, but they all impressed me with their talent and communication abilities. They also had a list full of great info in "bullet" form. This would help "old" golfers as well as new ones.

I really like these videos.  They offer basic techniques that make sense demonstrated by different women golfers.  Some of the tips and exercises in the tapes are essential for playing good golf.

Training tapes for women are very rare.  I'd get this one for overall improvement in your game.

The demonstrations were very clear, with easy to follow instructions. The practice advice was very helpful. This DVD brought my golf up from a beginner level to an intermediate level, as it made clear all the instructions from my lessons with professionals.
